name: Malcom in the Middle of Mischief
name_original: Malcom in the Middle of Mischief
description:
The theme of the jam was "That's not supposed to be there!".
And isn't that theme the very embodiment of what it's like to live with other people?
(We also borrowed some ideas from a little TV show you may have heard off, though the references are pretty subtle..)

Made by
Josh Davis
David Pecile
